Name: SMFly: Ice Age
About the game: SM Fly: Ice Age is an exciting adventure platformer with gravity switching. Feature of game: Changing gravity in 4 directions; Physics; Snowy mountains, but you are not in danger of cold; Convenient gravity control; Progress; Strong main character, he is afraid only of sharp saws. The main character is Mr. SM! In the game, you control a black alien with one eye, but not directly, but by directing it through the level collecting coins and moving to new levels through a teleport.
